Panzer::

Her pod skipped across the atmosphere of the earth, f=giving it tha 
appearance of a falling star.  The pods outer layers glowed bright 
red as it heated up.  The pod decended to the ground below.  It 
struct the ground with enough impact force, it created a crator 1/4th 
a mile across.  As the dust settled, the pod cooled and slowly 
returned to normal temperatures.  The bot inside was running internal 
and external diognostics.  Slowly, the pod opened.
Out jumped a sleek, black bot.  She stood only 5 foot tall in bot 
form and had a sleek, streamlined look to her figure. She had a 
matte, black finish on her body which gave off no reflection.  Her 
panther form stood out, even in bot form. She stood next to the pod, 
looking in all directions.  She wondered where she was.  She was glad 
to have escaped the explosion on her ship. Now she had to deal with 
what ever lived on this planet. She noticed she hand landed in the 
mountains. Green meadows could be seen with flowers blooming in a 
rainbow of colors.  She reached down and drew her fiream.  She bore 
the scars of many fights. She wasn't afriad of anything. She scanned 
the area, but her scanners were still scrambled from the crash. They 
would work in a few hours, but untill then, she would have to rely on 
her other resources. She sniffed the air, but smelled only the sweet 
fregrance of flowers.  She turned and saw a bird, small and blue, 
gliding lazily on the air currents.  She relaxed a bit, but kept her 
sidearm in hand.  Her maximal programming wasn't going to let her put 
her gaurd down. Not yet anyway.

She decided to scout the area and make the best of things.  She 
transformed into a black panther and started heading East.
